rows.title: County:
rows.description_1: County (can be filtered via search bar)

rows.title: Risk Levels
rows.description_1: Predicted risk-level (ranges from 1 to 8, based on "bins" for probability of riots) for the 3 month period being forecast.

rows.title: Riot-Probability:
rows.description_1: Predicted probability of riots (0-1) for the 3 month period being forecast.

rows.title: Predictions Increasing:
rows.description_1: True if predictions have increased for two consecutive months (note: some % change values be slightly positive, but show as 0 due to rounding).

rows.title: % change [Apr] to [May]:
rows.description_1: Percentage change of the predictions from the previous month to the current month.

rows.title: % change [Mar] to [Apr]:
rows.description_1: Percentage change of the predictions from 2 months ago to the previous month.

rows.title: Past 2-year Average:
rows.description_1: Average value predicted during the previous 2 years.

rows.title: > 2-year Average:
rows.description_1: True if the current month's prediction is higher than the average for the previous 2 years. False otherwise.
